A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What happened to the characters from the original trilogy? They've been dragged through the mud in order to embellish the new cast. This wasn't \"character development\" or \"evolution\"\, it was an assassination. As soon as I left the movie theatre I felt like I'd done something wrong. I feel like such a victim for paying to see this movie and for being so emotionally invested in the franchise. I ran home and have been listening to Linkin Park - Numb for a couple of hours now\, shaking.
